name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ring a ton - A Messenger ringtone customizer

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Choose what you want to hear when your friends text you

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Unlike the mobile version of Messenger, the web version does not include a ringtone customization feature as of now and that's exactly what this extension is for, just as simple as that.
